RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COULD BE A COUGAR set the pace from the inside and shook clear on the turn, then drew off in the drive to prove much the best under right handed crop urging. SO STEADY was outrun early, came four wide into the lane with run, angled in leaving the furlong marker and rallied well to gain the place award. INDY'S GOLDEN GIRL tracked the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn but flattened out, held show award. OUT OF AMMO was rated early, shifted out on the turn and came four wide into the lane and had no kick. RUSTY MY BROTHER was off a step slow, had a four wide run on the turn and came five wide into the lane and had no rally. WEST ABBOTT was well placed on the inside, steadied leaving the seven sixteenths and then weakened. UPTOWN SERAPHINA tracked the pace in between rivals and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Could Be a Cougar
ENTRY.OWNER: Wasabi Ventures Stables LLC Micovic Daniel and Offutt Brett
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, shook clear turn, drew off stretch, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Wasabi Ventures Stables LLC, Connie S.Black, Thirst Produc

ENTRY.NAME: West Abbott
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, steadied 7/16, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Seraphina
ENTRY.OWNER: Strunk John L Strunk Theresa A Baxter Ted R and Baxter Susan G
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace between horses, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Ammo
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, came 4 wide upper stretch, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Rusty My Brother
ENTRY.OWNER: Bone Robert D and Brown Edward Rusty J
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, 4 wide turn, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: So Steady
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, came 4 wide, angled in 1/8, rallied, got 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Indy's Golden Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, flattened out, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming P rice $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHATA GUY vied for the lead on the inside, angled out leaving the far turn and made a bid in the lane and wore down the front runner late to prove best under a drive. ANTE UP ALEX vied for the lead in between rivals, made a two wide bid on the turn and was clear by the furlon g marker but was caught late, second best. HE CAME TRUE was four wide into the first turn, vied for the lead on the outside and came four wide into the lane and faded, held show award. PEAKY BLINKERS was well rated on the inside, lacked the needed stretch bid, missed show award. INSTANT CHAOS was settled three wide and came four wide into the lane and had no rally. BOSSY CAT was settled on the inside and lacked a rally. LONG TOM failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Bossy Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Peaky Blinkers
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, needed stretch bid, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Long Tom
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Whata Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, angled out upper, bid, wore down rival, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Ante Up Alex
ENTRY.OWNER: Fanelli John and Longball Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, bid 2 wide, caught late, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: He Came True
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, vied 3 wide, came 4 wide, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Instant Chaos
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide backstretch, came 4 wide, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 69. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.;O lder, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT FUDGE WARRIOR set the pace on the inside, then was headed by the quarter pole, dug in gamely and dueled the length of the stretch and prevailed under a drive. CANDY ARCADE stalked the early pace three wide, made a three wide move on the turn to go on even terms with the winner by the quarter pole, then dueled with that rival to the wire and just missed, lost bob. SWEET MESA was reserved early, made a inside run on the turn and had a mild late gain to best the rest. HAPPYBIRTHDAYCOREY was fractious in the gate, bumped at the start, rated three to four wide, then raced wide on the turn and had no rally. DESI'S REWARD chased the early pace three wide and came four wide into the lane and weakened. MY LADY'S AUNT MA prompted the early pace two wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Fudge Warrior
ENTRY.OWNER: Two Ten Twelve Triple T Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed 1/4 pole, long drive, held gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Mesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, inside move turn, mild rally, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: My Lady's Aunt Ma
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 2 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Desi's Reward
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, came 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Happybirthdaycorey
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, bumped start, rated 4 wide, wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Arcade
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, long drive, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Si nce March 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT ACT tracked the early pace on the inside, shifted out and was three wide by the half mile marker, then made a three wide move on the far turn, continued that bid and edged clear late to prove best un der a drive. TATE was rated along four wide, made a four wide move to the outside of the winner on the far turn, but was outfinished in the final furlong, held place award. TRENDING UP was settled early, advanced four wide on the far turn, came five wide into the lane, angled out in the lane and closed well on the far outside. DR. STEVE set a fast pace on the inside while clear, then rated the second quarter, then drew clear again on the far turn, got out by the quarter pole and came six wide into the lane and faded. P JS SILVER DUKE was void of early speed and passed the tiring rivals. HERE'S WALDO stalked the early pace three wide and tired. COOL COMEDIAN was settled early and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Steve
ENTRY.OWNER: Morrone Stephen E Kimball Dan and Spendolini John
ENTRY.COMMENT: set fast pace inside, clear turn, got out 1/4, faded stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: P Js Silver Duke
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Act
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked rail, 3 wide 1/2, bid 3 wide, edged clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Here's Waldo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, inside 2nd turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Comedian
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Trending Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide 2nd turn, came 5 wide, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Tate
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 4 wide, bid 4 wide, outfinished, held 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Rac e Since February 20 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUARTERFLASH was taken back early to trail on the inside, came three wide into the lane and angled out to the far outside, then closed with a rush to get up in time under a drive. PHANCY PHILLY chased the early pace, advanced four wide on the turn and then closed well to gain a short lead leaving the sixteenth marker but was denied late to just miss. SCHNUER WILL stalked the early pace three wide, made a four wide bud by the quarter pole, then kept on grinding to the wire but was outfinished late. ORGANIZED CHAOS set the early pace and was clear then faded the final sixteenth. HELLO GRACIE was allowed to settle early, made a inside move on the turn but flattened out late. I CAME TO DANCE tracked the pace in between rivals and then weakened on the turn. ARROGANTE was reserved early five wide and was not a threat. COSMOLOGICAL was well placed early on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmological
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: I Came to Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace between horses, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Phancy Philly
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4 wide turn, closed, led late, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Organized Chaos
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, faded 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Quarterflash
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken back inside, came 3 wide, angled out, closed fast, up late

ENTRY.NAME: Hello Gracie
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside move turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Arrogante
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved 5 wide, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Schnuer Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 4 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OMIKAMI was well rated on the inside, eased out on the far turn and made a three wide bid, took over leaving the turn and drew off after one pop right handed with the crop, then drew off to prove much the best while being ridden out. BABKA was reserved early and advanced on the inside on the far turn, angled out when straightened and rallied well for the place award. DON'T ANNOY ME prompted the pace three wide, then went up to duel for command three wide to the quarter pole and weakened, held show award. RACE N RETURN was allowed to settle early, four wide on the turn and came five wide into the lane and had no rally. ME DARLIN KATHLEEN set the pace and then dueled for the lead on the inside and tired. WILD N' SASSY was void of early speed, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. KIRRABON chased the pace three wide, four wide on the far turn and tired. MISS MIA LIA vied for the lead in between rivals and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Babka
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, inside move, angled out, rallied for place

ENTRY.NAME: Omikami
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, eased out, bid 3 wide, drew off, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Me Darlin Kathleen
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, dueled inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Race N Return
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide turn, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mia Lia
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace between horses, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Annoy Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, dueled 3 wide, weakened, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Wild n' Sassy
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Kirrabon
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, 4 wide turn, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 20. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIGGERS DIAMOND was well rated along the inside, eased out mid way on the turn and made a four wide bid leaving the quarter pole, then drew out in the furlong grounds to prove much the best, driving. PAL CAL tracked the early pace, made a three wide bid to gain command leaving the quarter pole, but could not go with the winner while being clearly second best. PECOS BILL was four wide into the first turn, chased the pace four wide, came four wide into the lane and had no rally, bested rest. COAST TO COAST set the early pace and drew off on the backstretch, then was headed on the far turn and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Diggers Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, eased out turn, bid 4 wide, drew out, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Pal Cal
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, bid 3 wide, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Coast to Coast
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off backstretch, headed turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Pecos Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, chased pace 4 wide, came 5 wide, best rest
